Claim this listing now. Claim Listing Overview Contact Information Company Name Marando Farms Visit Website http://www.marandoranch.com/ Location Fort Lauderdale , Florida United States About Marando Farms Welcome to Marando Farm & Ranch, your one-stop destination for all things farm and ranch related! We are a community-focused establishment that offers a wide range of events and services to cater to your needs. Whether you're looking to host a special event, plan a wedding, or simply enjoy a fun day out with your family, we have got you covered.

At Marando Farm & Ranch, we pride ourselves on our commitment to supporting local farmers and producers. Our farm-to-table cafe offers a delectable selection of dishes made from locally sourced ingredients. By buying local, you not only get to enjoy fresh and high-quality food, but you also contribute to the growth and sustainability of your community.

But it's not just about the food! Our farm is home to a delightful petting zoo filled with furry rescue animals. These animals have found a loving home with the Marando family and are well taken care of by our dedicated team. We also offer pony and hay rides, making it a perfect destination for a fun-filled day out with the kids.

Located in downtown Davie, our farm and ranch are easily accessible, and we are here to serve you. Come and visit us to experience the joy of farm life and treat yourself to amazing goods. Whether you're looking for a relaxing day out or planning a special event, Marando Farm & Ranch is the place to be. Contact us today to learn more about our services and schedule your visit.
